dialog.text: Hi, I think I could find some help from you. The seeker  is helpful. The supporter could say something like "I am so grateful for your help. Thank you for everything."
Oh, hi there. Sure, I'm glad to be able to provide some assistance. Did anything happen?

Yeah, it's complicated, my life is all about making decisions right now. The seeker  is trying to tell the supporter that she is struggling to make decisions and that she is nervous about the future. The supporter could provide positive advice about what the seeker can do to make better decisions.
I'm sorry to hear that. What sort of things are you experiencing now?

It's so difficult. Well, it's about my boyfriend. I found him lying about everything. When we met, he said that he was divorced, but I ended up finding out that he was still legally married. He said that he needed sometimg to make the process, but I really don't know if I could trust him or not. I don't know what to do now... The seeker  is struggling with how to make decisions and the Supporter could tell the seeker to talk to a friend or family member about this.
I am so sorry that you were treated so badly. You deserve so much better than that!.
beam_texts: I am so sorry that you were treated so badly. You deserve so much better than that!.

dialog.text: I know, right? It's hard to let go of all the good times we had together, though. We've been together for 5 years. I don't know how to break it to him... The seeker  feels overwhelmed and confused because she have many memories of the good times they had together. The supporter could ask the seeker to share any memories that the seeker enjoys. The supporter could also ask the seeker to seek professional help.
I think it would be good for you to have a conversation with him about how you feel and ask him why he has been treating you so badly. I hope that I have been able to help a little!.
beam_texts: I think it would be good for you to have a conversation with him about how you feel and ask him why he has been treating you so badly. I hope that I have been able to help a little!.

dialog.text: You have! I'm just not sure how to start the conversation... The seeker  feels like she is being treated unfairly and needs to communicate this to her partner. The supporter could provide specific examples of things that are going on in the seeker's life that are causing her stress.

I think it would be good to be honest and say "I am feeling a little bit like you are ignoring me, and I don't like that." and then maybe give him some time to think about what he has done that could be making you feel that way?.
beam_texts: I think it would be good to be honest and say "I am feeling a little bit like you are ignoring me, and I don't like that." and then maybe give him some time to think about what he has done that could be making you feel that way?.

dialog.text: That sounds like a good plan. I just don't want it to blow up in my face. We are in a small town and if it gets bad enough, we will be known as the town who broke up over a boyfriend... The seeker  feels like she is the one who was treated poorly and needs to tell someone about her situation. The supporter could tell the seeker to talk to her boyfriend about how she feels and why he has been doing this to her. The supporter could also tell the seeker to have a conversation with her about why the seeker felt like she was being ignored.
I understand that. You could also tell a teacher or someone you trust about the situation. They will help you out. I know how hard this situation can be. I have been in a similar situation before..
beam_texts: I understand that. You could also tell a teacher or someone you trust about the situation. They will help you out. I know how hard this situation can be. I have been in a similar situation before..

dialog.text: I think I will do that. I will tell my math teacher. I really don't want to have to deal with him anymore. The seeker  feels broken because of their boyfriend. The supporter could help the seeker to understand why the seeker thinks the boyfriend is doing this to her. The supporter could also help the seeker to start a new relationship or relationship with better judgement.
I think that is a great idea. They will be able to help you out. I know this is hard, but I know you can make it through this!
beam_texts: I think that is a great idea. They will be able to help you out. I know this is hard, but I know you can make it through this!
